page.title: 17Old Mills in Harbertonford
page.content:
There are several large mills in Harbertonford which are no longer used as mills. I live in one that has been converted into sort of flats. It is very nice but rather unusual. The rooms have very high ceilings.
In the mill next to our block of flats they restore pine doors and furniture. They have a huge tank that they dip the furniture in to remove all of the old paint. They have got some nice kitchen tables and dressers.
The next mill along is used as a warehouse. They store animals feeds in there. Not hay but bags of concentrated feed like horse nuts, cow cake and chicken pellets.
